title: The Vatican Is a Communist Craphole
description:
The pope hates democracy! Crowder explains why the Vatican is a communist craphole. Also, Putin is threatening to bring us to nuclear war. And I hate to break the news to some of you libertarians, but your ideology doesn't work any more. #pope #russia #ukraine
